description: This table contains information about family medical history submitted by the patient in a history questionnaire.

columns.name: MESSAGE_ID
columns.description: The ID of the web-based chart system message record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: FAM_TOPIC_ID
columns.description: The ID of the family history topic in the history questionnaire submitted by the patient.

columns.name: FAM_TOPIC_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Visit Navigator (VN) History Template Definition (LQH) record.

columns.name: FAM_TOPIC_PROB_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value of the problem entered by the patient when answering a family history questionnaire.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: FAM_TOPIC_REL_C_NAME
columns.description:
The relation type of the family member entered by the patient in a family history questionnaire.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: FAM_TOPIC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the family member entered by the patient in a family history questionnaire.

columns.name: FAM_TOPIC_CMT
columns.description: The comment entered by the patient for a family history topic in a family history questionnaire.

columns.name: FAM_TOPIC_UNCHKD_YN
columns.description:
This column stores the problem status - checked or unchecked by the patient in MyChart.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: FAM_TOPIC_FILED_YN
columns.description:
The filed status of the family history topic--has the provider filed it to the patient's record.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: FAM_TOPIC_UNCHKD_YN

columns.name: FAM_TOPIC_REL_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique relationship of a family member.
